title: Billie on my future (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"my future" is a... I hold very close to my heart. It wasn't really the first song we wrote after the album but it was to me... like, it felt like the beginning of a new... "world," and a new feeling. It's cute to me now because I listen to it and... the girl singing it —which is me then— is singing about me now, and that makes me feel good. I listen to it now thinking about the future future me, and it, it gives me hope and... excites me.
